amendment.description: Amendment redirects funds within the International Border and Water Commission for the use of taking responsibility for the International Outfall Interceptor (IOI).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 82 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase then decrease funding within the International Border and Water Commission for the use of taking responsibility for the International Outfall Interceptor (IOI).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A079) Agreed to by recorded vote: 310 - 109 (Roll no. 328).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A079) Agreed to by recorded vote: 310 - 109 (Roll no. 328).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A079) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
